introduction.html:div: This plan describes the 0.9.0 Eclipse release of the EMFStore. The main goals of the release are to improve stability and to clean the APIs of EMFStore

release_deliverables.html:div: The EMFStore project delivers a model repository for EMF model instances. It supports versioning and collaboration on this models. The main focus is on offline collaboration. Therefore the EMFStore supports confilct detection and merging on models.

target_environments.html:div: The 0.9.0 release targets Eclipse Indigo and EMF 2.6

internationalization.html:div: The EMFStore offers only a few user visible components. It can be used and integrated completely headless. The UI does currently not support internationalization.

compatibility_with_previous_releases.html:div: The release contains minor API improvements compared to previous versions.
